response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us, but we understand its potential worth to you. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe strikes a balance between reflecting its true value and making it accessible to you. We hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know promptly. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
